00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging_ajax.inc.php';
00033 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/datagrid/simbio_dbgrid.inc.php';
00034 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';
00035 
00036 // privileges checking
00037 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('membership', 'r');
00038 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('membership', 'w');
00039 
00040 if (!$can_read) {
00041     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00042 }
00043 
00044 if (isset($_POST['doExport'])) {
00045     // check for form validity
00046     if (empty($_POST['fieldSep']) OR empty($_POST['fieldEnc'])) {
00047         utility::jsAlert(__('Required fields (*)  must be filled correctly!'));
00048         exit();
00049     } else {
00050         // set PHP time limit
00051         set_time_limit(3600);
00052         // limit
00053         $sep = trim($_POST['fieldSep']);
00054         $encloser = trim($_POST['fieldEnc']);
00055         $limit = intval($_POST['recordNum']);
00056         $offset = intval($_POST['recordOffset']);
00057         if ($_POST['recordSep'] === 'NEWLINE') {
00058             $rec_sep = "\n";
00059         } else if ($_POST['recordSep'] === 'RETURN') {
00060             $rec_sep = "\r";
00061         } else {
00062             $rec_sep = trim($_POST['recordSep']);
00063         }
00064         // fetch all data from biblio table
00065         $sql = "SELECT
00066             m.member_id, m.member_name, m.gender,
00067             mt.member_type_name, m.member_email, m.member_address,
00068             m.postal_code, m.inst_name, m.is_new,
00069             m.member_image, m.pin, m.member_phone,
00070             m.member_fax, m.member_since_date, m.register_date,
00071             m.expire_date, m.member_notes
00072             FROM member AS m
00073             LEFT JOIN mst_member_type AS mt ON m.member_type_id=mt.member_type_id ";
00074         if ($limit > 0) { $sql .= ' LIMIT '.$limit; }
00075         if ($offset > 1) {
00076             if ($limit > 0) {
00077                 $sql .= ' OFFSET '.($offset-1);
00078             } else {
00079                 $sql .= ' LIMIT '.($offset-1).',99999999999';
00080             }
00081         }
00082         // for debugging purpose only
00083         // die($sql);
00084         $all_data_q = $dbs->query($sql);
00085         if ($dbs->error) {
00086             utility::jsAlert(__('Error on query to database, Export FAILED!'));
00087         } else {
00088             if ($all_data_q->num_rows > 0) {
00089                 header('Content-type: text/plain');
00090                 header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="senayan_member_export.csv"');
00091                 while ($member_data = $all_data_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00092                     $buffer = null;
00093                     foreach ($member_data as $fld_data) {
00094                         $fld_data = $dbs->escape_string($fld_data);
00095                         // data
00096                         $buffer .=  $encloser.$fld_data.$encloser;
00097                         // field separator
00098                         $buffer .= $sep;
00099                     }
00100                     // remove the last field separator
00101                     $buffer = substr_replace($buffer, '', -1);
00102                     echo $buffer;
00103                     echo $rec_sep;
00104                 }
00105                 exit();
00106             } else {
00107                 utility::jsAlert(__('There is no record in membership database yet, Export FAILED!'));
00108             }
00109         }
00110     }
00111     exit();
00112 }
00113 
00114 ?>
00115 <fieldset class="menuBox">
00116 <div class="menuBoxInner exportIcon">
00117     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Export Data')).'<hr />'.__('Export member(s) data to CSV file'); ?>
00118 </div>
00119 </fieldset>

00122 // create new instance
00123 $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'', 'post');
00124 $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="doExport" value="'.__('Export Now').'" class="button"';
00125 
00126 // form table attributes
00127 $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00128 $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00129 $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00130 
00131 /* Form Element(s) */
00132 // field separator
00133 $form->addTextField('text', 'fieldSep', __('Field Separator').'*', ''.htmlentities(',').'', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00134 //  field enclosed
00135 $form->addTextField('text', 'fieldEnc', __('Field Enclosed With'), ''.htmlentities('"').'', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00136 // record separator
00137 $rec_sep_options[] = array('NEWLINE', 'NEWLINE');
00138 $rec_sep_options[] = array('RETURN', 'CARRIAGE RETURN');
00139 $form->addSelectList('recordSep', __('Record Separator'), $rec_sep_options);
00140 // number of records to export
00141 $form->addTextField('text', 'recordNum', __('Number of Records To Export (0 for all records)'), '0', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00142 // records offset
00143 $form->addTextField('text', 'recordOffset', __('Start From Record'), '1', 'style="width: 10%;"');
00144 // output the form
00145 echo $form->printOut();
